name: Saw or Die
description:
This small game is part of the course "Game a Week". As the name suggests we made this in a week. The provided topic was "Local Multiplayer".

This is a 2 player game. Saw humans in half or die!

Made by: Suzanne Bogaard, Benjamin Rose

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game a Week"  (WinterSemester 2019/2020)
